snippet: After spurning talks for months, the House demands a crisis-driven bargain from Democrats.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Republicans for their shifting and incoherent demands during prolonged government shutdown, contending that party is merely trying to save face; argues that request for inter-party 'dialogue' is particularly disingenuous, and meant simply to portray Pres Obama and Democrats as intransigent.
lead_paragraph: After spurning talks for months, the House demands a crisis-driven bargain from Democrats.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
